name: Soccer Pinball Pro
description:
Introducing Soccer Pinball: an electrifying blend of two classic games!

Take your shot at becoming the MVP you were destined to be in Exhibition or Season Mode.

Your goal in Exhibition Mode? To compete for the longest streak and climb your way to the top of the leaderboard.

Season Mode puts you to the real test! The further you advance, the more difficult your opponents become. Do you have what it takes?

Unlock plenty of unique soccer balls on your journey to the top.

Stay tuned for Season 2 in a future update.
